nodes.text: The Dragon's Pearl was an area of the Tatoo system that consisted of many asteroids.

During 1 ABY, the Dragon's Pearl became a hotspot for illegal activity. Many thugs, including the Black Sun and the Hutts, swarmed there to harasss defenseless freighters in the area, stealing loot without any signs of remorse. Fortunately, the Galactic Empire encircled the Dragon's Pearl, enforcing Imperial law with quick starships and flight prowess.
